verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and to \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* unto them,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w These|strong="H2063"\w* \add are\add* the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* which ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* among all the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* that \add are\add* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Whatsoever \w parteth|strong="H6536"\w* the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*, and is \w clovenfooted|strong="H8156"\w*, \add and\add* \w cheweth|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, among the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, that shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="H0389"\w* these shall ye not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of them that \w chew|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, or of them that \w divide|strong="H6536"\w* the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*: \add as\add* the \w camel|strong="H1581"\w*, because he \w cheweth|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, but \w divideth|strong="H6536"\w* not the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*; he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you.

And the \w coney|strong="H8227"\w*, because he \w cheweth|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, but \w divideth|strong="H6536"\w* not the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*; he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you.

And the \w hare|strong="H0768"\w*, because he \w cheweth|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, but \w divideth|strong="H6536"\w* not the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*; he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you.

And the \w swine|strong="H2386"\w*, though he \w divide|strong="H6536"\w* the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*, and be \w clovenfooted|strong="H8156"\w*, yet he \w cheweth|strong="H1641"\w* not the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*; he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* to you.

Of their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall ye not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and their \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* shall ye not \w touch|strong="H5060"\w*; they \add are\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* to you.

¶ These shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of all that \add are\add* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: whatsoever hath \w fins|strong="H5579"\w* and \w scales|strong="H7193"\w* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, in the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*, and in the \w rivers|strong="H5158"\w*, them shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

And all that have not \w fins|strong="H5579"\w* and \w scales|strong="H7193"\w* in the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*, and in the \w rivers|strong="H5158"\w*, of all that \w move|strong="H8318"\w* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and of any \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w thing|strong="H5315"\w* which \add is\add* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, they \add shall be\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w* unto you:

They shall be even an \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w* unto you; ye shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, but ye shall have their \w carcases|strong="H5038"\w* in \w abomination|strong="H8262"\w*.
Whatsoever hath no \w fins|strong="H5579"\w* nor \w scales|strong="H7193"\w* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, that \add shall be\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w* unto you.

¶ And these \add are they which\add* ye shall have in \w abomination|strong="H8262"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w*; they shall not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, they \add are\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w*: the \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*, and the \w ossifrage|strong="H6538"\w*, and the \w ospray|strong="H5822"\w*,
And the \w vulture|strong="H1676"\w*, and the \w kite|strong="H0344"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*;
Every \w raven|strong="H6158"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*;
And the \w owl|strong="H1323"\w*, and the night \w hawk|strong="H8464"\w*, and the \w cuckow|strong="H7828"\w*, and the \w hawk|strong="H5322"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*,
And the little \w owl|strong="H3563"\w*, and the \w cormorant|strong="H7994"\w*, and the great \w owl|strong="H3244"\w*,
And the \w swan|strong="H8580"\w*, and the \w pelican|strong="H6893"\w*, and the gier \w eagle|strong="H7360"\w*,
And the \w stork|strong="H2624"\w*, the \w heron|strong="H0601"\w* after her \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*, and the \w lapwing|strong="H1744"\w*, and the \w bat|strong="H5847"\w*.

All \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* that \w creep|strong="H8318"\w*, \w going|strong="H1980"\w* upon \add all\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, \add shall be\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w* unto you.

Yet these may ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of every \w flying|strong="H5775"\w* \w creeping|strong="H8318"\w* thing that \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* upon \add all\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, which have \w legs|strong="H3767"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, to \w leap|strong="H5425"\w* \w withal|strong="H2004"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

\add Even\add* these of them ye may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; the \w locust|strong="H0697"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*, and the bald \w locust|strong="H5556"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*, and the \w beetle|strong="H2728"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*, and the \w grasshopper|strong="H2284"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*.

But all \add other\add* \w flying|strong="H5775"\w* creeping \w things|strong="H8318"\w*, which have \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \add shall be\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w* unto you.

And for these ye shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of them shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And whosoever \w beareth|strong="H5375"\w* \add ought\add* of the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of them shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

\add The carcases\add* of every \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* which \w divideth|strong="H6536"\w* the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*, and \add is\add* not \w clovenfooted|strong="H8157"\w*, nor \w cheweth|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, \add are\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you: every one that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* them shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

And \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* upon his \w paws|strong="H3709"\w*, among all manner of \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* that \w go|strong="H1980"\w* on \add all\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, those \add are\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you: whoso \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* their \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And he that \w beareth|strong="H5375"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of them shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*: they \add are\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you.

¶ These also \add shall be\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you among the creeping \w things|strong="H8318"\w* that \w creep|strong="H8317"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; the \w weasel|strong="H2467"\w*, and the \w mouse|strong="H5909"\w*, and the \w tortoise|strong="H6632"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*,
And the \w ferret|strong="H0604"\w*, and the \w chameleon|strong="H3581"\w*, and the \w lizard|strong="H3911"\w*, and the \w snail|strong="H2546"\w*, and the \w mole|strong="H8580"\w*.

These \add are\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* to you among all that \w creep|strong="H8318"\w*: whosoever doth \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* them, when they be \w dead|strong="H4194"\w*, shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And upon whatsoever \add any\add* of them, when they are \w dead|strong="H4194"\w*, doth \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, it shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*; whether \add it be\add* any \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, or \w raiment|strong="H0899"\w*, or \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, or \w sack|strong="H8242"\w*, whatsoever \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* \add it be\add*, wherein \add any\add* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* is \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, it must be \w put|strong="H0935"\w* into \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and it shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*; so it shall be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*.

And every \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, whereinto \add any\add* of them \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w*, whatsoever \add is\add* in it shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*; and ye shall \w break|strong="H7665"\w* it.

Of all \w meat|strong="H0400"\w* which may be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, \add that\add* on which \add such\add* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: and all \w drink|strong="H4945"\w* that may be \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* in every \add such\add* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

And every \add thing\add* whereupon \add any part\add* of their \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*; \add whether it be\add* \w oven|strong="H8574"\w*, or \w ranges|strong="H3600"\w* for pots, they shall be broken \w down|strong="H5422"\w*: \add for\add* they \add are\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, and shall be \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you.

Nevertheless a \w fountain|strong="H4599"\w* or \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, \add wherein there is\add* \w plenty|strong="H4723"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, shall be \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*: but that which \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* their \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.\f + \fr 11.36 \ft wherein…: Heb. a gathering together of waters\f*

And if \add any part\add* of their \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon any \w sowing|strong="H2221"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* which is to be \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*, it \add shall be\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.

But if \add any\add* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* be \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and \add any part\add* of their \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* thereon, it \add shall be\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you.

And if any \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, of which ye may \w eat|strong="H0402"\w*, \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; he that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* thereof shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And he that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of it shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*: he also that \w beareth|strong="H5375"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of it shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And every creeping \w thing|strong="H8318"\w* that \w creepeth|strong="H8317"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add shall be\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w*; it shall not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*.

Whatsoever \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* upon the \w belly|strong="H1512"\w*, and whatsoever \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* upon \add all\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, or whatsoever hath \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* among all creeping \w things|strong="H8318"\w* that \w creep|strong="H8317"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, them ye shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; for they \add are\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8263"\w*.\f + \fr 11.42 \ft hath…: Heb. doth multiply feet\f*

Ye shall not \w make|strong="H8262"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8262"\w* with any creeping \w thing|strong="H8318"\w* that \w creepeth|strong="H8317"\w*, neither shall ye make yourselves \w unclean|strong="H2933"\w* with them, that ye should be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* thereby.\f + \fr 11.43 \ft yourselves abominable: Heb. your souls, etc\f*

For I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: ye shall therefore sanctify \w yourselves|strong="H6942"\w*, and ye shall be \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*; for I \add am\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*: neither shall ye \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5315"\w* with any manner of creeping \w thing|strong="H8318"\w* that \w creepeth|strong="H7430"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

For I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w bringeth|strong="H5927"\w* you up out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to be your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: ye shall therefore be \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, for I \add am\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, and of the \w fowl|strong="H5775"\w*, and of every \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w creature|strong="H5315"\w* that \w moveth|strong="H7430"\w* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and of every \w creature|strong="H5315"\w* that \w creepeth|strong="H8317"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*:

To make a \w difference|strong="H0914"\w* between the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* and the \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*, and between the \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* that may be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* and the \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* that may not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*.
